price: আমি ইচ্ছা কৰিলে সেইটো লুণীয়া কৰি দিব পাৰোঁ। তথাপিও তোমালোকে কৃতজ্ঞতা প্ৰকাশ নকৰা কিয়?
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ جَعَلۡنَٰهُ أُجَاجٗا فَلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu jaʿalnāhu ujājan falawlā tashkurūna
translations: then why are you not grateful
then why are you not grateful
